record.field: Booking No is required and can contain Arabic, English, and Numeric & Alphanumeric. Max length 50. Booking No cannot be 0 or NULL or Empty. Booking No cannot be changed once posted. Booking No must be unique.
Invalid Nationality Code. It must be numeric and available in lookup list.

Invalid Check In Date. It must be numeric in YYYYMMDD format. The Check In date must be less than or equal to Check Out date. Date must be Gregorian Only. Length Must be 8 characters. YYYY Should be only starting with 202 which means only 4th character could be 0-9. MM should be only between 01-12 (numbers between 0-9 must contains 0 as prefix so it will look like 01, 02, 03, .... 09) DD should be only between 01-31 (numbers between 0-9 must contains 0 as prefix so it will look like 01, 02, 03, .... 09)

Invalid Check Out Date. It must be numeric in YYYYMMDD format. The Checkout date must be greater than or equal to Check In date. Date must be Gregorian Only. Length Must be 8 characters. YYYY Should be only starting with 202 which means only 4th character could be 0-9. MM should be only between 01-12 (numbers between 0-9 must contains 0 as prefix so it will look like 01, 02, 03, .... 09) DD should be only between 01-31 (numbers between 0-9 must contains 0 as prefix so it will look like 01, 02, 03, .... 09)
Invalid Total Duration Days. It must be Numeric. It cannot be zero or negative.
Invalid Allotted Room No. Minimum Length 1 – Max 50, allowed English, Arabic & Numeric.
Invalid Room Rent Type. It must be numeric and available in lookup list.
Invalid Daily Room Rate. It must be numeric
Invalid Total Room Rate. It must be numeric. It cannot be 0 if Daily Room Rate is NOT 0.
Invalid VAT Value. It must be numeric & Amount only.
Invalid Municipality Tax. It must be numeric & Amount only.
Invalid Discount. It must be numeric & Amount only.
Invalid Grand Total. It must be numeric & Amount only. It cannot be 0 if any of following is NOT 0. - Daily Room Rate - Total Room Rate - VAT - Municipality Tax - Discount
Invalid Grand Total. The total must be equal to Sum of (Total Room Rate + VAT + Municipality Tax) – Discount.
Invalid Transaction Type Id. It must be numeric and can be only following values (1 = booking, 2 = CheckIn & 3 = Checkout). Valid values 1, 2 & 3.
Invalid Gender. It must be Numeric and can be only three values (0 = Not Found, 1 = Male , 2 = Female) , Check Lookup for more values if any.
Invalid User Id or UserId not found.
Invalid Transaction No or this Transaction No not found in MT database. It must be of type GUID.

Invalid Check In Time. It must be numeric and could hold value 0 if not determined yet in case of Transaction Type ID =1 (Booking), otherwise it should be in following format. HHMMSS. - HH must be between 0-23 (if length is 5 then it’s AM and hour will be represented with single number like 1 or 2 without 0 a prefix). - MM must be between 00- 59 (numbers between 0-9 must contains 0 as prefix so it will look like 01, 02, 03, .... 09) - SS must be between 00- 59 (numbers between 0-9 must contains 0 as prefix so it will look like 01, 02, 03, .... 09) - Checkin Time is mandatory at the time of CheckIn.

Invalid Check Out Time. It must be numeric and could hold value 0 if not determined yet in case of Transaction Type ID =1 (Booking) or TransactionTypeID=2 (CheckIn),otherwise it should be in following format. HHMMSS. - HH must be between 0-23 (if length is 5 then it’s AM and hour will be represented with single number like 1 or 2 without 0 a prefix). - MM must be between 00-59 (numbers between 0-9 must contains 0 as prefix so it will look like 01, 02, 03, .... 09) - SS must be between 00-59 (numbers between 0-9 must contains 0 as prefix so it will look like 01, 02, 03, .... 09) - CheckOut Time is mandatory at the time of CheckOut.
Invalid Customer Type. It must be numeric and available in lookup list.
Invalid No Of Guest. It must be numeric. It cannot be zero. Max Value 9999.
Invalid Room Type. It must be numeric and available in lookup list.
Invalid Purpose of Visit. It must be numeric and available in lookup list.
Invalid Payment Type value. It must be numeric and available in lookup list.
Invalid “No Of Rooms”. It must be numeric & can contain value from 1 to 9999. It cannot be zero.
Invalid Create or Update Flag. The value must be 1 or 2.
Invalid Date Of Birth. It must be either 0 if not found otherwise it should be always in following format. YYYYMMDD

This TransactionID & TransactionTypeID already exist. If you wish to update the same record please send a request with CUFlag=2. This will be valid in case of new record for Check-In & Checkout only with CUFlag=1 to avoid duplications

Updates on Booking & Check In are not allowed because Check out is created. If transactionTypeID=3 found in our database then Updates (CUFlag=2) will not be allowed on corresponding TrasactionTypeID=1 & TransactionTypeID=2 with same TransationID

Updates on Booking are not allowed because Check-In is created for same booking. If transactionTypeID=2 found only in our database then Updates (CUFlag=2) will not be allowed on corresponding TrasactionTypeID=1 with same TransationID
No updates allowed on this TransactionID because it is already cancelled. If [TransactionCancellationId] is NOT Null then Updates are not allowed.

You are trying to update a record, which does not exist. Please first create a record. It means Transaction ID & Transaction Type ID should first exist in our DB if we are receiving CUFlag =2 for above combination. This is true for booking, check in and checkout. Same Error code will be raised if you try to Checkout without Prior CheckIn by passing valid or invalid TransactionID.
Booking number and Userid combination should be unique. This check is valid if TransactionID is null and only for new booking/checkin/check out entry.
Channel name is missing or invalid. If you don’t know the channel name, please contact with NTMP Support email: ntmp@MT.gov.sa
Internal Server Error. Please try again later, if problem persist, contact with NTMP Support. ntmp@MT.gov.sa
Invalid Transaction ID or this Transaction ID not found in MT database. It must be of type GUID.
Invalid Cancel Reason. It must be numeric and available in lookup list.
Invalid Cancel With Charges. It must be numeric and can have only 2 values (1= Yes with Charges, 0 = Cancel without Charges)
Invalid Chargeable Days. If Cancelled with Charges then this field should not contain 0. If Cancelled without Charges then provide 0.Null is not allowed.
Invalid Room Rent Type. If Cancelled with Charges then this field should not contain 0 & It must be numeric and available in lookup list.
Invalid Daily Room Rate. If Cancelled with Charges then this field should not contain 0. It must be numeric only If provided. If Cancelled without Charges then provide 0. Null is not allowed.
Invalid Total Room Rate. If Cancelled with Charges then this field should not contain 0. It must be numeric only If provided. If Cancelled without Charges then provide 0. Null is not allowed.
Invalid VAT. If Cancelled with Charges then this field should not contain 0. It must be numeric (Amount) only If provided. If Cancelled without Charges then provide 0. Null is not allowed.

Invalid Municipality Tax. If Cancelled with Charges then this field should not contain 0. It must be numeric (Amount) only If provided. If Cancelled without Charges then provide 0. Null is not allowed.
Invalid Discount. If Cancelled with Charges then this field should not contain 0. It must be numeric (Amount) only If provided. If Cancelled without Charges then provide 0. Null is not allowed.

Invalid Grand Total. If Cancelled with Charges then this field should not contain 0. It must be numeric (Amount) only If provided. The grand total must be calculated as (Total Room Rate + VAT + Municipality Tax) – Discount. If Cancelled without Charges then provide 0. Null is not allowed.
Invalid User Id or UserId not found.
Invalid Payment Type value. It must be numeric and available in lookup list. If Cancelled with Charges then this field should not contain 0.
This operation is allowed only before Check In.
Invalid CU Flag. The value must be 1 or 2.
This transaction is already cancelled. If you wish to update this transaction please use CUFlag = 2 for updates.
Channel name is missing or invalid. If you don’t know the channel name, please contact with NTMP Support email: ntmp@mt.gov.sa
Internal Server Error. Please try again later, if problem persist, contact with NTMP Support. ntmp@mt.gov.sa
Invalid Transaction ID or this Transaction ID not found in MT database. It must be of type GUID.

Invalid Expense Date. It must be numeric in YYYYMMDD format Date must be Gregorian Only. Length Must be 8 characters. YYYY Should be only starting with 202 which means only 4th character could be 0-9. MM should be only between 01-12 (numbers between 0-9 must contains 0 as prefix so it will look like 01, 02, 03, .... 09) DD should be only between 01-31 (numbers between 0-9 must contains 0 as prefix so it will look like 01, 02, 03, .... 09)
Invalid Item Number. It must be numeric &Unique for each expense Item with respect to TransactionID & UserID.
ItemNumber not found in MT Database. (This case will be valid when CUFlag = 2 )
Invalid Expense Type ID. It must be numeric and available in lookup list.
Invalid Unit Price. It must be numeric.
Invalid Discount. It must be numeric only If provided.
Invalid VAT. It must be numeric in Amount only. It can contain 0.
Invalid Municipality Tax. It must be numeric in Amount only. It can contain 0.

Invalid Grand Total. It must be numeric in Amount only. If any of below items are not 0 then Grand Total cannot be 0. - Unit Price - Discount - VAT - Municipality Tax Formula: Grand Total = (Unit Price + VAT + Municipality) – Discount
Invalid Payment Type value. It must be numeric and available in lookup list.
No checkout data found for TransactionID.Please call this api once the checkout is done.
Invalid CU Flag Value. It must be 1=Add,2=Update
Same Transaction ID already found with Item Number. Please send it with CUFlag =2 if you wish to update.
Channel name is missing or invalid. If you don’t know the channel name, please contact with NTMP Support email: ntmp@mt.gov.sa
Internal Server Error. Please try again later, if problem persist, contact with NTMP Support. ntmp@mt.gov.sa

Invalid Update Date. It should be numeric in following format YYYYMMDD. Date must be Gregorian Only. Length Must be 8 characters. YYYY Should be only starting with 202 which means only 4th character could be 0-9. MM should be only between 01-12 (numbers between 0-9 must contains 0 as prefix so it will look like 01, 02, 03, .... 09) DD should be only between 01-31 (numbers between 0-9 must contains 0 as prefix so it will look like 01, 02, 03, .... 09)
Invalid Rooms Occupied. It must be numeric only. It can contain 0. It cannot be negative value.
Invalid Rooms Available. It must be numeric only. It can contain 0. It cannot be negative value if dayclosing=true.
Invalid Rooms Booked. It must be numeric only. It can contain 0. It cannot be negative value.
Invalid “RoomsOnMaintinance”. It must be numeric only. It can contain 0. It cannot be negative value.
Invalid UserId or User Id not found.
Invalid Transaction Id or TransactionId not found
Invalid Day Closing value. It should be true or false
Invalid Total Rooms value. It must be numeric only. It cannot contain 0.
Incorrect Total Rooms Value. Total Rooms value must be equal to sum of (Rooms Occupied + Rooms Available + RoomsOnMaintinance + RoomsBooked).
Invalid Total Adults value. It must be numeric only and Max Length 5 digits. It can contain 0 0 but not negative value
Invalid Total Children value. It must be numeric only and Max Length 5 digits. It can contain 0 0 but not negative value
Invalid Total Guests value. It must be numeric only and Max Length 6 digits. It can contain 0 but not negative value
Incorrect Total Guests value. It must be equal to sum of (totalAdults + totalChildren)
Total Guests is mandatory if day closing is true
Invalid Total Revenue value. It must be numeric only and Max Length 10 digits. It can contain 0 but not negative value
Total Revenue is mandatory if day closing is true
Channel name is missing or invalid. If you don’t know the channel name, please contact with NTMP Support email: ntmp@mt.gov.sa
Internal Server Error. Please try again later, if problem persist, contact with NTMP Support. ntmp@mt.gov.sa
bookingNo cannot be NULL or Empty
bookingNo not found in MT Database
Invalid bookingNo, bookingNo cannot be 0 , bookingNo Max length is 50 , bookingNo cannot have special characters
Total bookingNo allowed only 50 items to be in the list
Internal Server Error. Please try again later, if problem persist, contact with NTMP Support. ntmp@mt.gov.sa
